amendment.description: To strike the limitation on the use of funds for the issuance or implementation of certain rulemaking decisions related to the interpretation of "actual control" of airlines.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3619 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3619 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S3544; text: CR S3544) To strike the limitation on the use of funds for the issuance or implementation of certain rulemaking decisions related to the interpretation of "actual control" of airlines.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3619 proposed by Senator McCain.
